hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: migrer_sites
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Cocher cette case pour lancer automatiquement la migration du(des) site(s).

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: delete_old_platform
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Cocher cette case pour lancer enlever les anciens plateformes automatiquement.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cd $WORKSPACE echo "Reading Jenkins database config...." >&2 if [ -r $WORKSPACE/../.drush-deploy.rc ]; then echo "Reading database config...." >&2 . $WORKSPACE/../.drush-deploy.rc else echo "Database credentials not found"; exit 1; fi
#HASH=${GIT_COMMIT:0:4} #PLATFORMNAME=my-${ENVIRONMENT}-7.x-s{$COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_DAUPHIN_TESTS_FONCTIONNELS}-${BUILD_NUMBER} #AEGIRSRV=localhost #AEGIRUSER=aegir #AEGIRPATH=/var/aegir ARTIFACT=`ls $WORKSPACE/build/*.tar.gz` BUILDNAME=`basename "$ARTIFACT"` PLATFORMNAME=${ENVIRONMENT}-`echo "$BUILDNAME" | cut -d'.' -f1`-${BUILD_NUMBER} echo $PLATFORMNAME
if [ ${ENVIRONMENT} = dev ]; then DESTSRV=server_master else echo "ENVIRONMENT $ENVIRONMENT does not have defined destination server alias." exit -1 fi
# Script options set -x set -e
# Supprimer ancien bootstrap (besoin d'un sudo specifique...) if test -e $WORKSPACE/src/drupal; then # chmod +w $WORKSPACE/src/drupal/sites/default /bin/rm -rf $WORKSPACE/src/drupal fi
# exit 0;
# Bootstrap nouveau, utilise le cache ~jenkins/.drush/cache/download # drush make --prepare-install --translations=fr --contrib-destination=profiles/dauph_profile $WORKSPACE/dauph-profile/build/build-dauphin.make src/drupal
mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/src/drupal cd $WORKSPACE/src/drupal tar -xvf $WORKSPACE/build/${BUILDNAME} .
cd $WORKSPACE
echo "Rsync'ing ${PLATFORMNAME} to aegir" rsync -a src/drupal/ ${AEGIRUSER}@${AEGIRSRV}:${AEGIRPATH}/platforms/${PLATFORMNAME} #chown -R aegir:aegir ${AEGIRPATH}/platforms/${PLATFORMNAME}
echo "Declaring ${PLATFORMNAME} in aegir."
ssh ${AEGIRUSER}@${AEGIRSRV} "drush --root='${AEGIRPATH}/platforms/${PLATFORMNAME}' provision-save '@platform_${PLATFORMNAME}' --context_type='platform'" --web_server=@${DESTSRV} ssh ${AEGIRUSER}@${AEGIRSRV} "drush @hostmaster hosting-import platform_${PLATFORMNAME}" ssh ${AEGIRUSER}@${AEGIRSRV} "drush @hostmaster hosting-dispatch"
if [ "$migrer_sites" = "true" ]; then echo "Migrating all websites currently on ${ENVIRONMENT}-my-* to ${PLATFORMNAME}" ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa ${AEGIRUSER}@${AEGIRSRV} "./migrateS.drush ${ENVIRONMENT} ${PLATFORMNAME}" fi
if [ "$delete_old_platform" = "true" ]; then echo "Deleting old platform ${ENVIRONMENT}-my-*" ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa ${AEGIRUSER}@${AEGIRSRV} "./deleteP.drush ${ENVIRONMENT} ${PLATFORMNAME}" fi
# Clean up copied artifacts rm -rf $WORKSPACE/build/*
